official_title: A bill to prevent inequities in the administration of income determination pertaining to low-rent housing.

summary.text: Amends the United States Housing Act of 1937 to direct the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development, when determining eligibility for or the rental amount of low-income housing, to exclude $300 from the income of a family for the spouse of the head of the household if the spouse is 62 years of age or older, not a wage earner because of the presence in the household of children under seven years of age, or over 18 years of age and disabled.

titles.title: A bill to prevent inequities in the administration of income determination pertaining to low-rent housing.
